summary: A shrine on Ivarstead\'s bridge that allows you to get to High Hrothgar quickly, provided you have been there before.
descriptionHtml:
Details
=======

A shrine on Ivarstead\'s bridge that allows you to get to High Hrothgar quickly, provided you have been there before.  Based upon the fact I hate climbing those steps for 10 mins for no reason.  The shrine is on the bridge so it\'s not too cheaty...


Install
=======

1. Extract the files and readme to C:\\(Install Directory)\\Data
2. Start Skyrim, select Data Files, Check \"High Hrothgar Shortcut\" file.


Uninstall
=========

Delete the High Hrothgar Shortcut.esp, HighHrothgarShrineScript.pex and this readme :)


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

None
author: stewb

files.name: High Hrothgar Shortcut
files.changelogHtml: Uploaded and released. high hrothgar travel enabled.
